gw.plugin.contact

Class ContactCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.plugin.contact.ContactCreator

  • public class ContactCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can load or create Contacts based on a contactUID and type. We use this to centralize the finding/creation of PC Contacts from external Contact Management Systems in PC Java code, instead of relying on plugin implementations to know enough about our Bundles, database and entities to create the Contact on their own.

      • ContactCreator

        public ContactCreator(Bundle bundle)

    • Method Detail

      • createNonPersistentContactCreator

        public static ContactCreator createNonPersistentContactCreator()
        Static helper method called from the UI to create a ContactCreator with a non-persistable bundle. This is necessary because the PCF file is not allowed to reference com.guidewire classes like NeverPersistedBundle.
        Returns:
        a new ContactCreator instance backed by a NeverPersistedBundle. You cannot call commit() on this bundle, so it should only be used for read-only applications.

      • loadOrCreateContact

        public Contact loadOrCreateContact(java.lang.String addressBookUID,
                                   Contact type)
        Attempts to load the Contact with the given AddressBookUID from PolicyCenter, first looking in this ContactCreator's bundle, then searching the PolicyCenter database. If the Contact is found in either of these 2 places, it is loaded into the internal bundle and returned. If a Contact with that AddressBookUID is not found, a new one of the given ContactIntSubtype (e.g. Person, Company) is created in the internal bundle and then returned.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUID - - the AddressBookUID of the Contact to load or create
        type - - if the Contact is not found, the type of Contact to create
        Returns:
        a Contact, either found in the local bundle, loaded into the current bundle from the DB, or when those are not found, created in the bundle

      • loadContact

        public Contact loadContact(Contact contact)
        Loads the given Contact into the internal bundle of this ContactCreator, and then returns it. This method is primarily useful to process internal contacts from a read-only bundle in a combined list with Contacts from an external Contact Management System (CMS) - the internal contacts can use this method to be loaded into a consistent bundle, and the external Contacts can be loaded using loadOrCreateContact(String, typekey.Contact).
        Parameters:
        contact - the Contact to load
        Returns:
        the contact loaded into the internal Bundle
